snippet: For Magomed Abdusalamov, 34, also known as the Russian Tyson, life was never the same after he lost for the first time in his 19th professional fight.
abstract: Magomed Abdusalamov, heavyweight boxer from Russian republic of Dagestan, is paralyzed and unable to speak due to injuries sustained in 2013 fight against Mike Perez; now lives in Greenwich, Conn, with his wife and three daughters, requiring constant care and attention; family is unable to pay $2 million they owe in medical bills and is suing five ringside doctors, referee and New York State boxing inspector who were present at match.
lead_paragraph: For Magomed Abdusalamov, 34, also known as the Russian Tyson, life was never the same after he lost for the first time in his 19th professional fight.
